battle_potion.name: Battle Potion
battle_potion.description: Increases chance of victory for the next battle. Scales depending on level difference from +1 for Grumbos who are 20 levels higher than you to +5 if the same level or lower. Can have multiple active at the same time but only 1 will be used up every battle. Unaffected by level difference modifiers.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Decreases chance of victory by 5% for the next battle. Lose 5 extra HP per battle.

fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Only 1 time, if you were to lose gold in battle (not challenge), the Fools Gold will be lost instead.

pilfer.name: Pilfer
pilfer.description: Lose between 50-100 gold when you lose a battle.

gold_boost_1.name: Gold Boost 1
gold_boost_1.description: Gain between 25-75 gold when you win a battle.

charm_of_wumbo.name: Charm of Wumbo
charm_of_wumbo.description: Increases minimum battle victory chance to 20%. Calculated after all other chance modifiers.

flimsy_rope.name: Flimsy Rope
flimsy_rope.description: Has a 50% chance of avoiding any post battle Grumbo active effects (good or bad). Gets used up even if an effect wasn't avoided.

berserk_potion.name: Berserk Potion
berserk_potion.description: Increases victory chance by 5%. Every battle, the victory chance increased goes down by 1%, all the way down to -5% in the last battle. Can only have 1 active at a time.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: 10% chance to decrease chance of victory by 100%.

poison_charm.name: Poison Charm
poison_charm.description: Prevents poison. Poison that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.description: Reduces battle stock and HP to 0.

wild_swing.name: Wild Swing
wild_swing.description: Warrior only. POW/8 % chance of increasing chance of victory by 10%

observation.name: Observation
observation.description: Adventurer only. 10% chance to erase the level experience penalty.

outsmart.name: Outsmart
outsmart.description: 35% chance to double the WIS bonus chance in battle.

second_chance.name: Second Chance
second_chance.description: When you lose, 3% chance to win instead.

vision.name: Vision
vision.description: 20% chance to reduce damage to by you RES.

permaboost.name: Permaboost
permaboost.description: Randomly gain a permanent +1 boost to any character stat (POW, WIS, DEF, etc.)

brojob.name: Brojob
brojob.description: Heal for 20 HP and gain some pocket change of 20 gold.

bleed.name: Bleed
bleed.description: Bleed for extra damage based on duration. Also reduces your DEF and RES by 5 until it's gone.

grumbot_miner.name: Grumbot Miner
grumbot_miner.description: Grumbot mines for 10 battles, retrieving 90-150 gold after each battle.

throwing_shield.name: Throwing Shield
throwing_shield.description: Throw a shield at an enemy in battle. Increases chance of victory by DEF/3.
